QuestData.Title: Trench Warfare
QuestData.Description:
These would-be recruits seek a way to prove themselves. Let us give them the chance.
The specter known as Malifis has grown in strength by consuming our anima reserves. In this time of drought, we cannot afford to lose any of our most precious resource.
This threat needs to be dealt with immediately.
Use this horn to signal the scavengers we've recruited. Let us see how well they fight under our banner!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Ambient energy left from constant battles has created living masses of necromancy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Baron's Warhorn to defeat Malifis.
QuestData.RewardText:
A threat removed for the House of the Chosen, and new recruits that show potential.
Good work.
